document_data.mainbody:
ighluthholt was a temple to Mielikki in the High Forest destroyed in the early 13 century DR.
It lay amidst the forest some days journey east of Secomber.
In the , Highluthholt was attacked and torn apart by a flight of seven wyverns that carried off a number of treasures, including the holy spellbook Yornars Trail Companion. The culprit was suspected to be a villainous wizard who used magically controlled wyverns in a number of robberies and raids around the time. The name and fate of this wizard were unknown, and the Companion remained lost for years.
